scriptTask.name: 1.1 Preparation Copy Scripts
scriptTask.script: mkdir SugarCRM; cd SugarCRM && wget http://www.iaas.uni-stuttgart.de/institut/mitarbeiter/binz/scripts.zip && unzip -q scripts.zip

scriptTask.name: 1.2 Preparation Update Redhat
scriptTask.script: echo "sudo nohup yum -y update &" > /tmp/yum-update.sh && sh -x /tmp/yum-update.sh; echo $?

scriptTask.name: 5.2 Sugar CRM DB create
scriptTask.script: echo "create database SugarCRM;" | sudo mysql -h localhost; echo $?

scriptTask.name: 6.3 Sugar CRM Configure
scriptTask.script: sudo SugarCRMKey=dummy AdminUser=admin AdminPassword=admin DemoData=false sh ~/SugarCRM/scripts/SugarCrmApplication/configure.sh ; echo $?

scriptTask.name: 6.4 Sugar CRM Set File Access Rights
scriptTask.script: sudo touch /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/sugarcrm.log && sudo chmod a+w /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/sugarcrm.log; echo $? && sudo touch /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/install.log && sudo chmod a+w /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/install.log; echo $?

scriptTask.name: 6.5 Sugar CRM Patch config_si
scriptTask.script: sudo sed -i 's/YOURWEBPORT/80/' /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php ; echo $? && sudo sed -i 's/YOURDBUSER/root/' /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php ; echo $? && sudo sed -i 's/YOURDBPASSWORD/password/' /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php ; echo $? && sudo sed -i 's/YOURDBHOST/localhost/' /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php ; echo $? && sudo sed -i 's/DBPORT/3306/' /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php ; echo $? && sudo sed -i 's/YOURDBNAME/SugarCRM/' /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php; echo $? && sudo sed -i "s/'setup_db_create_database' => 0/'setup_db_create_database' => 1/" /var/www/html/SugarCE-Full-6.4.2/config_si.php ; echo $?

scriptTask.name: 2.2 MySQL Install
scriptTask.script: cd ~/SugarCRM/scripts/MySql && sudo sh ~/SugarCRM/scripts/MySql/install.sh && sudo chown -R mysql:mysql /var/lib/mysql; echo $?

assignment.from: string('php.x86_64 php-cli.x86_64 php-common php-mbstring.x86_64 php-imap php-mysql')
